name: Secret Sword
description: You attempt to pierce a creature with one of your sharp appendages. Make a melee attack, dealing 3d10 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. This move ignores any boosts affecting the target's AC.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
